docs.text:
Welcome to the CVTeque API Documentation


Overview


This documentation describes how to use the API.


The API contains data about Users, Employees, Skills and Experience of the apps. The app is deployed to Heroku at 
https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/
.


It handles resources with routes such as 
GET
, 
POST
, 
PATCH
 or 
DELETE
.


The API is powered by 
Vapor
, a Swift server side framework.


Vapor utils commands




vapor xcode
 - Regenerate the API project and download dependancies.


git push heroku master
 - Deploy the changes which have been commited to the Heroku server.




Available services


Here is the list of the available services




CRUD
1
 User


CRUD
 Employee 


CRUD
 Experience


CRUD
 Skill


Link a User and an Employee


Add, read or delete skills for a given Employee


Add, read or delete experiences for a given Employee




Project layout


App/
    Controllers/
        UserController          # Routes methods of User.
        EmployeeController      # Routes methods of Employee.
        SkillController         # Routes methods of Skill.
        ExperienceController    # Routes methods of Experience.
    Model/
        User            # Entity of the User.
        Employee        # Entity of the Employee.
        Skill           # Entity of the Skill.
        Experience      # Entity of the Experience.
    Utils/
        ErrorsManager   # Class handling errors 
Run/
    main.swift  # The main Swift file where the Droplet is configurated













Create, Read, Update and Delete an Entity

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text:
Users


Description


User is the Entity that is responsible to manage all the Users that are registered in the app, it regroups some generic properties such as identity, e-mail, etc.


A User have a 
One to One
 relationship with 
Employee
 as an Employee is a sub-entity of User. 


Properties








Field


Type


Description










firstName


String


The first name of the user






lastName


String


The last name of the user






compagnyName


String 
optional


The compagny name where is working the user






ldap


String 
optional
 
(unique)


The LDAP identifier of the user if exists






email


String 
(unique)


The e-mail address of the user






employeeId


Int 
optional


The foreign key ID of the associated Employee










Info


All parameters required by routes of the API need to be passed as JSON format




Read all users


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users





Read a specific user


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/:id





Usage example


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/99





Parameters








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The user's ID you want to see.








Create a user


POST


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users





JSON example


    
{

      
created object
:
 
{

        
lastName
:
 
Roani
,

        
compagnyName
:
 
Wordline
,

        
firstName
:
 
Anthony
,

        
email
:
 
anthonyroani@gmail.com
,

        
ldap
:
 
ARI
,

        
employeeId
:
 
null

      
},

      
success
:
 
true

    
}






Update a user


PATCH


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/:id





Usage example


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/99





Parameters








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The user's ID you want to update.








JSON example


    
{

        
firstName
:
Anthony
,

        
lastName
:
 
Roani
,

        
compagnyName
:
Genesis groupe
,

        
ldap
:
,

        
email
:
a.roani@genesis-groupe.com

    
}






Delete a specific user


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/:id





Usage example


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/99





Parameters








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The user's ID you want to delete.

docs.text:
Employees


Description


Employee is the entity that is responsible to manage all the 
employees
 associated to a User entity. 


The entity has a 
One to Many
 relationship with Experience as he can have several experiences.


Properties








Field


Type


Description










employeeId


Int


The foreign key ID of the Employee that have the Experience






trigram


String
 
(unique)


The trigram of the Employee (
ARI
 for example)






availableDate


String


The date where the Employee complete a mission










Info


All parameters required by routes of the API need to be passed as JSON format




Read all employees


Returns the list of all employees and their experiences


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees





Response example


    
[

      
{

        
experiences
:
 
[],

        
trigram
:
 
PMU
,

        
availableDate
:
 
03-11-2017

      
},

      
{

        
experiences
:
 
[],

        
trigram
:
 
ARI
,

        
availableDate
:
 
03-11-2017

      
},

      
{

        
experiences
:
 
[],

        
trigram
:
 
SCH
,

        
availableDate
:
 
03-11-2017

      
}

    
]








Warning


In order to create an Employee, 
the corresponding User needs to be created before
. This POST request requires the ID of the User.




POST


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees





JSON example


    
{

        
trigram
:
ARI
,

        
availableDate
:
 
12-06-2017
,

        
userId
:
1

    
}






Response example


    
{

      
employee
:
 
{

        
trigram
:
 
PLU
,

        
userId
:
 
1
,

        
availableDate
:
 
03-11-2017

      
},

      
success
:
 
true

    
}






Update an employee


PATCH


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id





Usage example


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to update.








JSON example


    
{

        
trigram
:
PLU
,

        
availableDate
:
03-11-2017
,

        
userId
:
1

    
}








Tip


The JSON is the same as Create, just change the values you want.




Response example


    
{

      
updated object
:
 
{

        
trigram
:
 
PLU
,

        
userId
:
 
1
,

        
availableDate
:
 
03-11-2017

      
},

      
success
:
 
true

    
}






Delete a specific Employee


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id





Usage example


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99





Parameters








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to delete.

docs.text:
Skills


Description


Skill is the class that is responsible to manage all the skills of the CVTeque.


However, this is not the class responsible of managing skills of an Employee.


See 
here
 to know how to manage skills for a specific Employee.


Properties








Field


Type


Description










name


String 
(unique)


The name of the skill






color


String


The hexadecimal string of the color










Info


All parameters required by routes of the API need to be passed as JSON format### Read all skills




GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills





Read a specific skill


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/:id





EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/99





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The skill's ID you want to see.








Create a skill


POST


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skill





EXAMPLE OF JSON


    
{

        
name
:
Swift
,

        
color
:
#F4F4F4

    
}






Update a skill


PATCH


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/:id





EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/99





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The skills's ID you want to update.








EXAMPLE OF JSON


    
{

        
name
:
C#
,

        
color
:
#FEB6A5

    
}






Delete a specific skill


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/:id





EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/99





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The skills's ID you want to delete.

docs.text:
Experiences


Description


Experience is the entity that is responsible to manage all the experiences associated to an Employee. 


Properties








Field


Type


Description










trigram


String


The trigram of the employee 
(example: 
ARI
)






availableDate


String


The date when the employee ends its mission. 
Format is 
DD-mm-yyyy
.






employeeId


Int


The foreign key associated of the Employee object that have the Experience. 
Format is 
DD-mm-yyyy
.








Available operations


Read all experiences


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences





Create and update an Experience


An Experience can be created for a particular Employee.


See 
here
 to know how to 
manage
 an Experience for an Employee.
docs.title: Experiences

docs.text: Experience is the entity that is responsible to manage all the experiences associated to an Employee.
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Field  Type  Description      trigram  String  The trigram of the employee  (example:  ARI )    availableDate  String  The date when the employee ends its mission.  Format is  DD-mm-yyyy .    employeeId  Int  The foreign key associated of the Employee object that have the Experience.  Format is  DD-mm-yyyy .
docs.title: Properties

docs.text: https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences
docs.title: GET

docs.text: An Experience can be created for a particular Employee.  See  here  to know how to  manage  an Experience for an Employee.
docs.title: Create and update an Experience

docs.text:
Add an experience to an Employee


Relationships : read, create, update and delete


Read the experiences of an Employee


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id/experiences





EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/experiences





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to see.








Response example : an array of experiences


    
{

      
experiences
:
 
[

        
{

          
endDate
:
 
15-08-2017
,

          
desc
:
 
Adolescebat autem obstinatum propositum erga haec et similia multa scrutanda, stimulos admovente regina, quae abrupte mariti fortunas trudebat in exitium praeceps, cum eum potius lenitate feminea ad veritatis humanitatisque viam reducere utilia suadendo deberet, ut in Gordianorum actibus factitasse Maximini truculenti illius imperatoris rettulimus coniugem.
,

          
title
:
 
Vapor Developer
,

          
compagnyName
:
 
Volvo
,

          
startDate
:
 
15-04-2015
,

          
employeeId
:
 
1

        
},

        
{

          
endDate
:
 
15-08-2017
,

          
desc
:
 
Adolescebat autem obstinatum propositum erga haec et similia multa scrutanda, stimulos admovente regina, quae abrupte mariti fortunas trudebat in exitium praeceps, cum eum potius lenitate feminea ad veritatis humanitatisque viam reducere utilia suadendo deberet, ut in Gordianorum actibus factitasse Maximini truculenti illius imperatoris rettulimus coniugem.
,

          
title
:
 
Vapor Developer
,

          
compagnyName
:
 
Volvo
,

          
startDate
:
 
15-04-2015
,

          
employeeId
:
 
1

        
}

      
]

    
}






Create an experience for an Employee


This endpoint adds an Experience for an Employee. 


POST


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id/experiences





EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/experiences





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to add an experience.








Requirements


It needs a JSON 
Experience
 object passed in the request's body.


EXAMPLE OF JSON


    
{

        
title
:
Vapor Developer
,

        
compagnyName
:
Volvo
,

        
desc
:
Adolescebat autem obstinatum propositum...
,

        
startDate
:
15-04-2015
,

        
endDate
:
15-08-2017

    
}
   





Update an experience for an Employee


This endpoint updates an existing experience for an Employee.


PATCH


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:employee_id/experiences/:experience_id





EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/experiences/10





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










employee_id


Int


The employee's ID you want to update the experience.






experience_id


Int


The experience's ID you want to update.










Warning


All the parameters must be sent to update an Experience.




EXAMPLE OF JSON


    
{

        
title
:
Vapor Developer
,

        
compagnyName
:
Volvo
,

        
desc
:
Adolescebat autem obstinatum propositum...
,

        
startDate
:
15-04-2015
,

        
endDate
:
15-08-2017

    
}
   







Tip


The same JSON as Create an Experience, just change the values you want.




Delete a specific Experience


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id/experiences/:id





Usage example


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/experiences/3





Parameters








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to delete.








Delete all the Experiences of an Employee


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id/experiences





EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/experiences





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to delete.

docs.text:
Link a skill to an Employee


Description


An Employee can have one or more skills. This page describes the way to link or unlink an existing Skill to an Employee.




Info


As we have a many-to-many relationship between Skill and Employee, we have created a intermediate table that we used to match skills with employees. 




Relationships : read, linking and delete


Read the skills of an Employee


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id/skills





EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/skills





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to see.








Response example : an array of skills


{

  
skills
:
 
[

    
{

      
name
:
 
C#
,

      
skill_details
:
 
{

        
skillLevel
:
 
4

      
},

      
id
:
 
4
,

      
color
:
 
#BBBBBB

    
},

    
{

      
name
:
 
PHP
,

      
skill_details
:
 
{

        
skillLevel
:
 
4

      
},

      
id
:
 
6
,

      
color
:
 
#BBBBBB

    
}

  
]


}






Link a skill for an Employee




Warning


Skills must already exist in the database before linking a Skill to an Employee.




This endpoint links a Skill to an Employee. 


POST


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id/skills





EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/skills





PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to link a Skill.








Requirements


When linking a Skill to an Employee, it needs to know the skill level of the Skill. 


Just post it with the following json.


EXAMPLE OF JSON


  
{

    
skillLevel
:
4

  
}






Delete a specific Experience


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id/skills/:id





Usage example


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/skills/3





Parameters








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to delete.
docs.title: Manage skills of Employee

docs.title: GET

docs.title: EXAMPLE USAGE

docs.title: PARAMETERS
Response example : an array of skills

docs.text: Warning  Skills must already exist in the database before linking a Skill to an Employee.   This endpoint links a Skill to an Employee.
docs.title: Link a skill for an Employee

docs.text: https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id/skills
docs.title: POST

docs.text: https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/skills
docs.title: EXAMPLE USAGE

docs.text: Field  Type  Description      id  Int  The employee's ID you want to link a Skill.
docs.title: PARAMETERS

docs.text: When linking a Skill to an Employee, it needs to know the skill level of the Skill.   Just post it with the following json.
docs.title: Requirements
EXAMPLE OF JSON

docs.text: https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id/skills/:id
docs.title: DELETE

docs.text: https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99/skills/3
docs.title: Usage example

docs.text: Field  Type  Description      id  Int  The employee's ID you want to delete.
docs.title: Parameters
